content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2023 College Football Championship Packages

Roadtrips’ bespoke travel packages to the 2023 College Football Championship are fully customizable to allow you to design the perfect trip to the grand finale of the college football season. Our football specialists will work with you to create a travel package that includes first-class accommodations in Los Angeles, your preferred tickets in the stunning SoFi Stadium, and more. Get your first glimpse of tomorrow’s stars in action while enjoying the best of Los Angeles. Complete 2023 College Football Championship packages are available from $4,225 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2023 College Football Championship

The 2023 College Football Championship will play out in Los Angeles’ state-of-the-art SoFi Stadium on January 9, 2023. It’s the perfect way to start off the new year: a little holiday and some incredible football. This isn’t just any football game though, it’s a showcase of collegiate football’s elite in their biggest game of the year. Teams will take to the field in January ready to battle for the national title and all the glory that comes along with winning the pinnacle event of the season.
